## Framework.tap property

Execute a callback

Signature:

```typescript
tap: methods.tap;
```

## Remarks

Callback is provided [the Framework instance](/api/bud-framework/framework) as a parameter.

## Example 1

```js
bud.tap((bud) => {
  // do something with bud
});
```

## Example 2

Lexical scope is bound to Framework where applicable, so it is possible to reference the Framework using `this`.

```js
bud.tap(function () {
  // do something with this
});
```
